name: Dark Way Home (DUELOS, Nuno, Madnum Soul, LocalNoodle)
name_original: Dark Way Home (DUELOS, Nuno, Madnum Soul, LocalNoodle)
description: Family is something you want close to you, but sometimes when they are gone creatures lurk to haunt you, loneliness becomes unbearable and the night becomes a real life nightmare. In Dark Way Home you play as Marcel, having spent most of his life in England he wasn't around his family for some years, one vacation he decided to go back to spend time with family, little did he know things weren't the same as before.
